sentences.en: Angela: Have you ever seen a Ford Siesta?
sentences.cn: 安琪拉: 你见过福特西斯塔 吗 ?

sentences.en: Angela: Personal? This is your personal invitation to view the new Ford Siesta Turbo.
sentences.cn: 安琪拉: 私人? 这是私人请柬参观新福特·西斯塔涡轮汽车.

sentences.en: Angela: to view the sensational new Ford Siesta Turbo.
sentences.cn: 安琪拉: 参观令人兴奋的新福特·西斯塔涡轮汽车.

sentences.en: Attend after lunch his siesta a hour.
sentences.cn: 午餐以后照料他午睡一小时.

sentences.en: Before going out for dinner I took a Spanish siesta.
sentences.cn: 吃晚饭前偶小憩了一下.

sentences.en: But it was tough to get to sleep after that siesta I had.
sentences.cn: 但是偶在小憩过后实在很难入睡.

sentences.en: He is in siesta, enjoined not to call him.
sentences.cn: 他在午睡, 嘱咐过不要叫他.

sentences.en: I went upstairs for my afternoon siesta.
It may be easier to try again in three hours, after their siesta.
sentences.cn: 也许待他们午睡过后,即三个小时以后, 会比较容易接通.

sentences.en: Lots of people were taking a short siesta in the shade.
sentences.cn: 午后很多人在阴凉处小睡.

sentences.en: Man 1 : He could win a new Ford Siesta!
sentences.cn: 男士 一: 获胜的话,他会获得一部新的福特·希斯特轿车!

sentences.en: Siesta started after lunch and ended about 1500 hours ( 3 pm ) after the heat of the day.
sentences.cn: 午睡是午餐后到1500 ( 下午三点 ),在睡眠中度过一天最热的时候.

sentences.en: They have a siesta during the hottest part of the day.
sentences.cn: 他们会在一天中最炎热的时刻小睡一会儿。

sentences.en: You know, I could really do with a siesta, she said.
sentences.cn: “你看, 我真得去睡个午觉, ”她轻声说.

trans.tran_en: a short sleep in the afternoon, especially in warm countries
